```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(haven)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(ggridges)
library(ggthemes)
library(lubridate)
library(haven)
library(stats)
```

```{r read data}
pols_month_data = 
  read.csv("pols-month.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(mon = as.Date(mon,format = "%Y-%m-%d")) %>% 
  mutate(month = lubridate::floor_date((mon), unit = "month"))


GDP_data = read.csv("GDP.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date,format = "%Y-%m-%d")) %>% 
  mutate(month = lubridate::floor_date((date), unit = "month"))

combined_data = left_join(pols_month_data,GDP_data, by = "month")
```
